articles.content: The battle royale title, The Culling, is once again returning to Xbox One, this time with several changes, including better graphics, better AI and possibly one of the most punishing monetisation models ever seen. The Culling: Origins will cost $5.99, however… [+1856 chars]

articles.title: Why Animal Crossing: New Horizons fans fear voided villagers moving out - Polygon
articles.description: Animal Crossing: New Horizons actually remembers villagers who move out of your town, such that they may appear on a friends’ island. For some, this is a nightmare known as “the void,” because it means that ugly or unwanted villagers who purposefully got kick…
articles.content: While Animal Crossing may have hit the mainstream in 2020, the franchise and its community have a much longer history, over the years developing customs, etiquette, and entire concepts which may not be known to the average player. For instance: the void, a pl… [+4211 chars]

articles.author: Clare Duffy, CNN Business
articles.title: This security flaw puts millions of computers at risk for a serious (but unlikely) hack - CNN
articles.description: A new report from a Dutch security researcher details a hacking mechanism that targets a common feature on millions of computers: the Thunderbolt port.
